item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @brendan_swan brendan swan
item.description:
@brendan_swan wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

Their should be a Timer somewhere. At least I thought the method had a Timer. Look for a Timer somewhere around the coding.

thats everythin around it… no timer

[code]witch (p.spell) {
case 56:
if (opp.freezeDelay > 0) {
p.message(“Your opponent is already held by a magical force.”);
p.resetAttack();
Engine.playerMovement.resetWalkingQueue§;
return;
} else {
opp.freezeDelay = 15;
Engine.playerMovement.resetWalkingQueue(opp);
}
break;
case 63:
if (p.InBounty == 1) {
p.message(“You cannot use this spell inside the Bounty Hunter crater.”);
return;
}
opp.teleblocked = 1;
opp.requestGFX(1843, 0);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p,
“You have teleport blocked your opponent.”);
break;
}
}

@SuppressWarnings("unused")
private int getRandom(int range) {
	return (int) Math.round(Math.random() * range);
}

private int getRandom(double range) {
	return (int) Math.round(Math.random() * range);
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
